inclusion.criterion: Patients planned for laparoscopic ventral hernia repair
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Ventral hernias with other localization than the midline
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has abdominal pain, leukocytosis, and a distended appendix with thickened appendiceal wall. She is a candidate for laparoscopic appendectomy under general anesthesia.
